column4: hey guys, just something i miss from my good ole KDE days.... i have a folder with a bunch of zip files.... i want to extract them all into folders with the names of the files .... that is make these folders and then extract thier respective zips into them.... in ark, this was an option, but i dont think i can do it in gnome outside of scritping it myself?
one of the joys of linux, applications aren't tied to desktop managers
